  • Constructor Details

    • Question

      public Question(String questionText, Question.QuestionType questionType, Integer maxChoices, ArrayList<String> choices, Boolean order, Integer minBound, Integer maxBound)
      General constructor for the Question class, all unused parameters are null
      Parameters:
      questionText - The text of the question
      questionType - The type of the question
      maxChoices - Maximum choices for MULTIPLE_CHOICE question
      choices - Available choices for MULTIPLE_CHOICE question
      order - If it's a qualitative ordered question, or a a qualitative unordered question
      minBound - The minimum bound for a NUMERICAL question
      maxBound - The maximum bound for a NUMERICAL question

      public Object getQuestionInfo()
      Retruns the information relevant for each type of question, useful for Kmeans
      Returns:
